column2:
"At last, I am myself again.
And yet, something important is missing...
I feel I have forgotten my mission."

"Ugh... This final gap in my memory...
Just before I arrived in this world, when I was surrounded in deepest darkness, someone gave me a mission..."

"...Yes, in darkness...
Perhaps if I can return to that darkness through battle, my purpose might be restored."

"I will need a companion on this journey into darkness. Will you...
No, you SHALL accompany me."
